text: Mislav Vrlić (born 4 April 1996) is a Croatian professional water polo player. He is currently playing for VK Primorje Regionalna vaterpolo liga-Mislav Vrlić. He is 6 ft 6 in (1.99 m) tall and weighs 243 lb (110 kg). He started playing water polo at the age of 6.Bek "primorjaša" zaigrao nakon osam mjeseci: 'Osjećaj je fantastičan' His older brother Josip is also water polo player. ==References== ==External links== * Instagram * Facebook * Vaterpolist VK Primorja, Mislav Vrlić, posjetio je Specijalnu bolnicu Medico i našeg ortopeda prof. dr. sc. Radovana Mihelića. Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian male water polo players
title: Mislav Vrlić
